metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29961 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When styling and rendering an oversized `<select>` element, Firefox did not apply correct clipping which allowed an attacker to paint over the user interface. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '89.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
